name: Greenhouse Biomass Production
description: This experiment aims to maximize the monthly biomass production of sugar beet in a greenhouse. The weather conditions are maintained throughout the month, and the biomass produced is measured at the end. The initial biomass is 0.41 kg/ha.

parameters.name: wind
parameters.description: Daily mean wind speed at 2m above the surface (m/s)

parameters.name: wav
parameters.description: Initial amount of water in total soil profile (cm)

parameters.name: SMLIM
parameters.description: Initial maximum moisture content in initial rooting depth zone
